seniority_level.evidence: Pass1 shows 5-7 years of experience; title does not include senior/lead designation.

job_family.evidence: Title and description refer to a Data Engineer role focusing on pipelines and data processing.

sub_specialty.evidence: Job mentions both batch and real‑time processing without specific streaming or warehouse technologies, indicating a general data engineering focus.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No direct‑report or people‑management responsibilities are listed; role is purely technical.

primary_cloud.evidence: Job posting does not reference any cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP, etc.).

secondary_clouds.evidence: No additional cloud platforms are mentioned.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Description explicitly mentions both batch and real‑time processing.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: Only relational databases (Oracle, MySQL) are cited; no warehouse or lake terminology appears.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location restriction to Bengaluru, India (specific_countries = IN).

timezone_focus.evidence: Job location in India implies an APAC time‑zone focus.

relocation_required.evidence: Posting specifies Bengaluru location and provides no relocation offer.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned in the posting.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT or student visa support.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship clause; only a country‑specific location requirement, implying work‑authorization in India.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM typically hires full‑time employees for such roles; employment type not stated but implied.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits array is empty and no perks are described in the posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career progression or growth tracks.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with diverse teams, suggesting informal mentorship opportunities.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement paths appears.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No reference to internal transfers or mobility programs.

career_tracks_available.evidence: The job description does not outline any specific career tracks (IC, management, etc.).

requirement_strictness.evidence: Must‑have list includes multiple specific BPM tools and 5+ years experience; education is required.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses specifically on data engineering and BPM workflow development.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skills and experience align with a typical 5‑7 year mid‑level data engineer role.
